properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Little Creek VA to Cape Henry VA including the Chesapeake Bay Bridge Tunnel; Chesapeake Bay from New Point Comfort to Little Creek VA; James River from James River Bridge to Hampton Roads Bridge-Tunnel
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 10 at 12:54PM EST until February 11 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds increase to 15 to 20 kt Tuesday morning
and persist into early afternoon. Winds will decrease in the
evening. Waves 2 to 3 ft expected.

* WHERE...Chesapeake Bay from New Point Comfort to Little Creek
VA,and from Little Creek VA to Cape Henry VA including the
Chesapeake Bay Bridge Tunnel and James River from the James
River Bridge to Hampton Roads Bridge-Tunnel.

* WHEN...From 7 AM to 7 PM EST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM EST TUESDAY
